[Abhishek Kumar](https://akumar.netlify.app/) is working as Senior Research Fellow at [Panjab University, Chandigarh](https://www.puchd.ac.in/). His current research focuses the patterns and processes of plant distribution and diversity in Indian Siwaliks. He is interested in studying the responses of ecosystem structure and functions to ongoing climate change across various ecological, spatial and temporal scales.
